title: DC Comics Animated Films (1993-2016) [720p + English Subs]
description:
DC Comics Animated Films (1993-2016)


720p

[English Subs]



This is a repack and update of the following torrent:
 
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8978724/DC_Comics_-_Animated_Original_Movies_Collection_1993_-_2013_720p


The first 28 films are 720p and have dual audio (Portuguese and English) as in the source torrent.


Additions & Changes:

- Files and folders renamed to English
- English subtitle files (.srt)
- Films released after 2013 (29-36)

Films 29-36 were collected from KAT and are 1080p except for Son of Batman (30.) and Batman vs. Robin (33.), which are 720p.
